name: Inconversant
description:
Inconversant is a survival horror game, with puzzle and combat elements.

The game is about a person that's been chasing and trying to stop a spree killer, with a mystery of supernatural beings following the killer.

The game is set in Eastern Europe during the tough times and the protagonist is Pawel Kozlowski - a young journalism student, from poor family, who's working as a taxi driver to pay his bills and scholarship. One night he found himself in the wrong place at the wrong time...

Step into the story of a suffering individual whose life turns into a complete horror.


Inconversant CD Case by pirolida on Sketchfab
